{{billDetails | json}}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import {HttpClient} from "@angular/common/http"; import {ActivatedRoute, Router} from "@angular/router"; @Component({ selector: 'app-bill-details', templateUrl: './bill-details.component.html', styleUrls: ['./bill-details.component.css'] }) export class BillDetailsComponent { billDetails:any; billId!:number; constructor(private http:HttpClient, private router:Router, private route: ActivatedRoute) { this.billId=route.snapshot.params['billId']; } ngOnInit(): void { this.http.get("http://localhost:8888/BILLING-SERVICE/fullBill/"+this.billId).subscribe({ next : (data)=>{ this.billDetails = data; }, error : (err)=>{} }); } }
